botan.pubkey.algo.ec_group

ECC Domain Parameters

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

struct ECGroup;
Class representing an elliptic curve

this()(auto ref const CurveGFp curve, auto ref const PointGFp base_point, auto ref const BigInt order, auto ref const BigInt cofactor, in string oid = "");
Construct Domain paramers from specified parameters

Params:
CurveGFp curve elliptic curve
PointGFp base_point a base point
BigInt order the order of the base point
BigInt cofactor the cofactor
string oid the provided oid

this()(auto ref const Vector!ubyte ber_data);
Decode a BER encoded ECC domain parameter set

Params:
Vector!ubyte ber_data the bytes of the BER encoding

this(in OID domain_oid);
Create an EC domain by OID (or throw new if unknown)

Params:
OID domain_oid the OID of the EC domain to create

this(in string pem_or_oid = "");
Create an EC domain from PEM encoding (as from PEM_encode), or from an OID name (eg "secp256r1", or "1.2.840.10045.3.1.7")

Params:
string pem_or_oid PEM-encoded data, or an OID

const Vector!ubyte DER_encode(ECGroupEncoding form);
Create the DER encoding of this domain

Params:
ECGroupEncoding form of encoding to use

Returns:
bytes encoded as DER

const string PEM_encode();
Return the PEM encoding (always in explicit form)

Returns:
string containing PEM data

const ref const(CurveGFp) getCurve();
Return domain parameter curve

Returns:
domain parameter curve

const ref const(PointGFp) getBasePoint();
Return domain parameter curve

Returns:
domain parameter curve

const ref const(BigInt) getOrder();
Return the order of the base point

Returns:
order of the base point

const ref const(BigInt) getCofactor();
Return the cofactor

Returns:
the cofactor

const string getOid();
Return the OID of these domain parameters

Returns:
the OID
